title: WIndows Vista
body: MY friend got onto league on my PC; It said something about windows vista.  I have Windows Vista, and this morning i go to log onto league, the client wont open! Riot my PC has more then enough specs to run league of legends, Windows 10 wont download onto my computer, i have put over 50$ into league of legends. Why then do you purposely fuck me over, purposely not allow me to play league of legends? Why do i have to buy a new laptop when my laptop is powerful enough?

replies.body: lolol... holy crap... this is whats wrong with America.

If you can provide more information about the error you're seeing, we'd be happy to take a look.  We were having some login issues earlier today (If affected, you'd see something about a "RADS Error" when launching League), but otherwise I don't see anything at the moment that should be stopping you from playing.
